feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Team Win Over/Under Picks, Most Important Swing Players in the League, Top 10 SG’s and Bench Players, a Possible Klay Extension, Breaking News on Harden - Season 3 Episode 5

link.title: Team Win Over/Under Picks, Most Important Swing Players in the League, Top 10 SG’s and Bench Players, a Possible Klay Extension, Breaking News on Harden - Season 3 Episode 5

entry.content:
The NBA season is just days away, and Noah and Jack are pumped for the games to officially begin. This week, the guys make their over/under picks for team wins this year, including predictions for the Celtics, Suns, Hornets, Mavericks, Knicks, and more. They then discuss the most vital players in the league this year that could potentially swing the season. Next, Jack gives his top 10 shooting guards and bench players for the season, and they finish the show with a discussion on a potential contract extension for Klay Thompson (oh, and we have breaking news on James Harden too!). Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Preseason in Full Swing, Western Conference and League Wide Storylines, Top 10 PG’s, SF’s, PF’s, C’s, and Joel Embiid to Play for Team USA - Season 3 Episode 4

link.title: Preseason in Full Swing, Western Conference and League Wide Storylines, Top 10 PG’s, SF’s, PF’s, C’s, and Joel Embiid to Play for Team USA - Season 3 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week, Noah and Jack talk about what they’ve noticed from the preseason so far, including the returns of stars from injury and the rotation in Charlotte. They also discuss the Pelicans, Timberwolves, and some of the other interesting teams heading into the season, as well as the new player resting policy. Afterwards, Noah and Jack present their top 10 lists for various NBA positions, and close out the show discussing Joel Embiid’s choice to play for the United States in the 2024 Olympics.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Jrue Holiday Heads to Boston, Portland’s Trade Returns, Vassell Extension, Media Day Storylines, and Miami’s Outlook for the Season - Season 3 Episode 3

link.title: Jrue Holiday Heads to Boston, Portland’s Trade Returns, Vassell Extension, Media Day Storylines, and Miami’s Outlook for the Season - Season 3 Episode 3

entry.content:
This week, Noah and Jack talk about the big trade sending Jrue Holiday to the Celtics, and Portland’s return for both of their recent deals. They also talk about the Spurs extending Devin Vassell, and break down some interesting quotes we heard earlier this week on media day. They close the episode giving some harsh truths about the current state of the Miami Heat after missing out on Lillard.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: EMERGENCY POD: DAME TRADED TO MILWAUKEE TO TEAM UP WITH GIANNIS - Season 3 Episode 2

link.title: EMERGENCY POD: DAME TRADED TO MILWAUKEE TO TEAM UP WITH GIANNIS - Season 3 Episode 2

entry.content:
Big first day back! Noah and Jack are joined once again by Lucas Jafet of the Share The Rock podcast. The guys discuss anything and everything regarding today’s blockbuster trade. Dame to the Bucks, Ayton to Portland, and what’s next for Jrue Holiday?

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Season 3 Is Here, Biggest NBA Storylines With Lucas Jafet - Season 3 Episode 1

link.title: Season 3 Is Here, Biggest NBA Storylines With Lucas Jafet - Season 3 Episode 1

entry.content:
This week, Noah and Jack are joined by guest Lucas Jafet, of the Share The Rock Podcast, for the debut episode of season 3 of One on One. As season 3 begins, the show will return to a weekly recording schedule, so stay tuned for far more consistent content.

With the 23-24 campaign almost underway, the guys discuss the latest with Harden and Dame. They then detail six of the biggest stories heading into training camp, including the Celtics, Bucks, and the new NBA player resting policy.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: World Cup, Team USA Update, Christian Wood Joins LA, the Latest on Harden, 76ers, and PJ Washington’s New Contract - Season 2 Episode 36

link.title: World Cup, Team USA Update, Christian Wood Joins LA, the Latest on Harden, 76ers, and PJ Washington’s New Contract - Season 2 Episode 36

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack break down Team USA’s outlook as the World Cup is down to just 4 and how they can take home the trophy. They discuss Christian Wood joining the Lakers on a minimum deal and how he can help LA make a championship run. The guys also go over the latest with James Harden, as well as a recent veteran addition for the 76ers, in addition to PJ Washington signing a new long-term contract with Charlotte.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Harden Speaks From China, Newly Signed Extensions, Team USA at the World Cup, and ESPN Sets New Broadcast Teams - Season 2 Episode 35

link.title: Harden Speaks From China, Newly Signed Extensions, Team USA at the World Cup, and ESPN Sets New Broadcast Teams - Season 2 Episode 35

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack delve deep into the James Harden vs Daryl Morey fiasco in Philly. They also talk contract extensions for Anthony Davis and Josh Hart and discuss Team USA’s World Cup chances. They wrap the show by giving their thoughts on ESPN’s NBA broadcast teams and the newly released regular season schedule.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Jaylen Brown Gets a Record-Setting Bag, Dame and Harden Are Still Waiting for Trades, and the Future of Donovan Mitchell - Season 2 Episode 34

link.title: Jaylen Brown Gets a Record-Setting Bag, Dame and Harden Are Still Waiting for Trades, and the Future of Donovan Mitchell - Season 2 Episode 34

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss Jaylen Brown receiving the biggest contract in league history and all the pressure on the Celtics this year. They also talk about Damian Lillard and James Harden, as both are still hoping for trades before the start of the season, as well Donovan Mitchell, and whether or not he’ll sign a contract extension in Cleveland.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Dame and Harden Trade Requests, Free Agency Recap - Season 2 Episode 33

link.title: Dame and Harden Trade Requests, Free Agency Recap - Season 2 Episode 33

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss the recent news regarding Damian Lillard and James Harden, as both future Hall of Famers have now requested trades. The guys talk about how these situations might play out, and what the potential trade returns could be for both. Then, they recap a wild and rich free agency period, in which over 2 billion dollars have been handed out. Which deals did Jack and Noah like, which confused them, and what teams intrigue them most for this upcoming season?

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Draft Recap, Trades Galore, Naz Reid Extended, and a Look Into Free Agency - Season 2 Episode 32

link.title: Draft Recap, Trades Galore, Naz Reid Extended, and a Look Into Free Agency - Season 2 Episode 32

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss the offseason and all the action across the NBA. They talk about their thoughts on the draft, including Scoot vs Miler, the surprising fall of Cam Whitmore, and their favorite picks of the night. Then they talk about all the recent trades, with Marcus Smart, Kristaps Porzingis, Tyus Jones, CP3, Jordan Poole, and John Collins among those on the move. The guys then finish the show discussing the extension for Naz Reid and give some predictions for free agency, which starts Friday evening (which is also Noah’s birthday)!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
